'''1.20.10.0''' is the first beta version of [[Minecraft Education 1.20.12]], released on June 30, 2023.<ref name=changelog2>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230702065845/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/16763242057748-What-s-new-in-the-Trails-Tales-Beta-v1-20-10-|title=What's New in the Beta|website=Minecraft: Education Edition Support}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.19.60|Bedrock Edition 1.19.70|Bedrock Edition 1.19.80|Bedrock Edition 1.20.0|Bedrock Edition 1.20.10}}
* Added features from [[Trails & Tales]].

; [[Settings|Menu]]
* Added "My Templates" button.

== Changes ==
; [[Agent]]
* Now has no range restrictions, it can move and build far away from the player.
* Now has an animation for unsuccessful actions.
* Now chooses which item to detect or interact with in a “line of sight” in the direction the code specified, up to 1 block away.

== Fixes ==
* Increased the reliability of multiplayer connections and decreased the number of disconnections during a multiplayer session.</onlyinclude>
